title: How to Print a Booklet Using Adobe Reader

steps.title: Set the printer to another PDF printer if you like.
steps.content: Set the printer to another PDF printer if you like. Or check Save to File.

steps.title: Set Page Scaling to Booklet Printing.
steps.content: Set Page Scaling to Booklet Printing. Also: Booklet subset to Both sides. Sheets from 1 to (whatever number). Auto-rotate pages. Binding should be Left.

steps.title: Now, if you print to PDF first to test, then you can turn off Page Order when you print.
steps.content: Now, if you print to PDF first to test, then you can turn off Page Order when you print. On your printer you will need to set Duplex binding to open to Top!!!
